turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Google, or me some coffee to-go.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like me to order your coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one closest to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A caffe mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll order you an iced mocha. Do you have any special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. No whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no whipped cream. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Have them use soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will tell them to use soy milk. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What sized caffe mocha would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The biggest they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I will order you an Iced Venti Mocha, no whipped cream with soy milk to be picked up at your nearest Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank You.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed and will be ready for pickup shortly. I will text you a confirmation.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.
